pages.text: "Thaumaturgy... which giveth certain order to make strange works, of the sense to be perceived and of men greatly to be wondered at."$(br)- Mathematicall Praeface to$(br)  Euclid's Elements (1570),$(br)  John Dee$(br2)Thaumaturgy is the capability of a magician to work miracles. A practitioner of thaumaturgy is a thaumaturge, thaumaturgist$(br)   or miracle worker.

The Thaumonicon cannot be simply crafted ... one must first discover the method for doing so.  While you're out mining you may run across clusters of brightly-coloured crystals growing out of the nearby stone.  When you harvest these crystals for the first time you may get a strange message suggesting that rest will inspire you ...
